summary:
This mod adds 4 new spells to the game:
- Intense Sparks
- Intense Thunderbolt
- Intense Lightning Storm
- Conjure Master Storm Atronach
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds 4 new spells to the game:
- Intense Sparks
- Intense Thunderbolt
- Intense Lightning Storm
- Conjure Master Storm Atronach

All of the spell tomes can be found on the floor of Dragonsreach

----------------------
INTENSE SPARKS
----------------------
This one is identical as the original sparks spell, but the damage is greater, as well as the cost.

--------------------------------
INTENSE THUNDERBOLT
--------------------------------
This one throws a ball of sparks that does a lot of damage, and should kill a guard in one hit.

-------------------------------------
INTENSE LIGHTNING STORM
-------------------------------------
This one is for Master wizards that want to deal tons of damage, but for its cost. Takes 4.5s to load. Great deal for killing dragons.

---------------------------------------------------
CONJURE MASTER STORM ATRONACH
---------------------------------------------------
A regular storm atronach, with the difference that it lasts for 600 seconds. Dual-wield it for 1200 secs!

Feedbacks and issue reports, as well as suggestions are welcome at nicholasgodoyx@gmail.com
author: Nicholas
